category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_hierarchy_sort_option
preference.preference_description: Determines how the classification hierarchy tree is sorted and displayed. The tree is sorted and displayed alphanumerically in ascending order based on the value assigned. Valid Values: -600 - Class ID/subclass ID. Groups are treated as classes. -607 - Name. -612 - User1 property -613 - User2 property
